page.title: 20END OF THE DAY AT BODICOTE.
page.content:
I GO OUT TO PLAY WHILE MY FRIEND HAS HER DINNER.I PLAY WITH SOME OF MY OTHER FRIENDS,ON THE LOGS,WHILE I WAIT FOR HER.THEN THE BELL RINGS FOR ME TO HAVE MY DINNER.SOMETIMES I SAVE HER SOME CRISPS.AT THE END OF THE DAY OUR TEACHER TELLS US A STORY AND WE GO HOME.SOMETIMES WE WALK HOME ON OUR OWN. WHEN WE ARE AT HOME I GO AND PLAY WITH HER OR SHE COMES AND PLAYS WITH ME.I HAVE MY DINNER AT 6 O'CLOCK.THEN I PLAY WITH MY TOYS.I GO TO BED AT 8.OO OR 8.3OPM.
SIGNED ON BEHALF OF THE THIRD AND FOURTH YEAR CHILDREN,BISHOP LOVEDAY C OF E SCHOOL,BODICOTE,BANBURY,JULY 1985. WITH THANKS TO ALL THOSE WHO SO KINDLY CO-OPERATED WITH US.
